miniaesdemo

Class Tables

  • java.lang.Object
    • miniaesdemo.Tables

  • public class Tables
extends java.lang.Object

    This class contains constant tables with results to calculations done in:

    1. MiniAES.nibbleSub(int[])
    2. MiniAES.shiftRows(int[])
    3. MiniAES.subBytes(int[])
    4. MiniAES.mixColumns(int[])
    5. MiniAES.mixColumnsAES(int[])
    6. MiniAES.inverseNibbleSub(int[])
    7. MiniAES.inverseSubBytes(int[])
    8. MiniAES.inverseMixColumnsAES(int[])

    It provides a straightforward way to access a specific value from each table:

    1. getNibbleSubValue(int)
    2. getInverseNibbleSubValue(int)
    3. getMixColumnValue(int, int)
    4. getSBoxValue(int)
    5. getInverseSBoxValue(int)
    6. getMUL2Value(int)
    7. getMUL3Value(int)
    8. getMUL9Value(int)
    9. getMUL11Value(int)
    10. getMUL13Value(int)
    11. getMUL13Value(int)
    12. getMUL14Value(int)
    Since:
    0.1

    • Field Detail

      • NIBBLE_SUB_TABLE

        private static final java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> NIBBLE_SUB_TABLE

        This variable is a HashMap of elements that store the nibble substitution table. Values in this table can be accessed through it's getter method. getNibbleSubValue(int) and getInverseNibbleSubValue(int).

      • MULTIPLICATION_TABLE

        private static final int[][] MULTIPLICATION_TABLE

        This variable is a n integer array of elements that store the MiniAES mixColumns multiplication substitution table. Values in this table can be accessed through it's getter method. getMixColumnValue(int, int).

      • S_BOX_TABLE

        private static final int[][] S_BOX_TABLE

        This variable is a n integer array of elements that store the AES S-BOX substitution table. Values in this table can be accessed through it's getter method. getSBoxValue(int).

        private static final int[][] INVERTED_S_BOX_TABLE

        This variable is a n integer array of elements that store the AES inverse S-BOX substitution table. Values in this table can be accessed through it's getter method. getInverseSBoxValue(int).

      • getNibbleSubValue

        public static int getNibbleSubValue(int value)

        This method takes a value and using a nibble substitution table, returns the substituted value.

        Parameters:
        value - A value to be substituted.
        Returns:
        Returns the result of the substitution.

      • getInverseNibbleSubValue

        public static int getInverseNibbleSubValue(int value)

        This method takes a value and using a nibble substitution table, returns the inverted substituted value.

        Parameters:
        value - A value to be substituted
        Returns:
        Returns the result of the inverted substitution.

      • getMixColumnValue

        public static int getMixColumnValue(int row,
                                    int column)

        This method simulates a MixColumn Multiplication using the MixColumn Multiplication table to generate results

        Parameters:
        row - The first argument of MixColumn Multiplication.
        column - The second argument of MixColumn Multiplication.
        Returns:
        Returns the result of the MixColumn Multiplication.

        public static int getSBoxValue(int value)

        Parameters:
        value - An integer value to be substituted with an S-BOX value.
        Returns:
        Returns the substituted integer value.
